00029 namespace spot
00030 {
00032   class explicit_connected_component: public scc_stack::connected_component
00033   {
00034   public:
00035     virtual ~explicit_connected_component() {}
00041     virtual const state* has_state(const state* s) const = 0;
00042 
00044     virtual void insert(const state* s) = 0;
00045   };
00046 
00049   class connected_component_hash_set: public explicit_connected_component
00050   {
00051   public:
00052     virtual ~connected_component_hash_set() {}
00053     virtual const state* has_state(const state* s) const;
00054     virtual void insert(const state* s);
00055   protected:
00056     typedef Sgi::hash_set<const state*,
00057                           state_ptr_hash, state_ptr_equal> set_type;
00058     set_type states;
00059   };
00060 
00062   class explicit_connected_component_factory
00063   {
00064   public:
00065     virtual ~explicit_connected_component_factory() {}
00067     virtual explicit_connected_component* build() const = 0;
00068   };
00069 
00073   class connected_component_hash_set_factory :
00074     public explicit_connected_component_factory
00075   {
00076   public:
00077     virtual connected_component_hash_set* build() const;
00078 
00080     static const connected_component_hash_set_factory* instance();
00081 
00082   protected:
00083     virtual ~connected_component_hash_set_factory() {}
00085     connected_component_hash_set_factory();
00086   };
